Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Baltimore in 2020...

Injured on 8/30/2022 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 6/21/2023...
Traded from Baltimore to Minnesota on 1/31/2024 (Going to MIN: SS Manny Machado. Going to BAL: 2B Frank Woodward, P Antonio Quiros, LF Freddie Freeman, P Daniel Nellis)...
